external_games.name: World of Tanks Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: K-91 Version II

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: K-91 Version II
summary:
Ready to command a "heavium" tank? The K-91 Version II gives you an impressive mix of solid turret armor, good mobility, and a reliable gun, allowing you to switch between offense and defense with a versatile play style.

Make the K-91 Version II yours with the Tank of the Month bundle! You'll also receive Silver Boosters and Premium Account time for extra earnings and Gold to fine-tune your vehicles with everything you need.

Bundle includes:
• K-91 Version II Soviet Tier VIII Medium Tank
• 850 Gold
• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (10) x1.5 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.
